text: In computing, an output device is a peripheral equipment device that is used to give the results of processed data. == Examples == * Video card and monitor (screen): displays information on the screen for you to look at. * Computer printer: It takes information from a computer and prints it out so that you can see it. * Sound card and speaker: that play sounds and music. * Computer terminal * numerical controlled machine tools. ==Related pages== * Input device == References == Category:Computer hardware Category:Computer science
title: Output device
